description: A massive island-sized ship commanded by Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. It serves as a floating fortress where Moria creates his zombie army using stolen shadows.

keyEvents.title: Nightmare Luffy's Entrance
keyEvents.description: Nightmare Luffy appears on Thriller Bark to save his crew and battle Oars and Gecko Moria.
keyEvents.significance: The location of the climactic battle between Nightmare Luffy and Oars/Moria.

keyEvents.title: Gomu Gomu no Storm Devastates Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: Nightmare Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Storm sends Oars flying across Thriller Bark, scaring away all zombie soldiers.
keyEvents.significance: The power display demonstrates the scale of the battle taking place on this massive ship.

statusHistory.reason: Location of ongoing battle between Straw Hats and Gecko Moria's forces
